original_text: The apostles continued to teach about the Lord Jesus. They spoke with great power. They told people, ‘After Jesus died, God caused him to live again. We saw that happen.’ God was very kind to all the believers and he helped them in many ways.
korean_text: 사도들이 큰 권능으로 주 예수의 부활을 증언하니 무리가 큰 은혜를 받아

sentences.original_text: The apostles continued to teach about the Lord Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 사도들은 주 예수님에 대해 계속해서 가르쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: God caused him to live again.

sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그 일이 일어나는 것을 보았습니다.'

sentences.original_text: God was very kind to all the believers
and he helped them in many ways.
